headline: Schlumberger (SLB): “Best House in a Bad Neighborhood” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer’s Thoughts on These 9 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. Jim Cramer, host of Mad Money, recently pointed out some unexpected trends in the stock market this year, spotlighting […]
